summary: MIT is a famous research university in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA. It was started in 1861 to help with the country's growing need for technology and science. The university follows a European style of teaching, focusing on hands-on learning in science and engineering. MIT has a big campus by the Charles River and many other important research places. Many famous scientists, engineers, and successful people have studied or worked there, including Nobel Prize winners and astronauts. MIT is also known for its entrepreneurial spirit, with many successful companies started by its alumni.
title: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
